question: Where is the Central institute of freshwater aquaculture(CIFA) located?
explanation: Central Institute of Freshwater Aquaculture (CIFA) is an advanced research institute for freshwater aquaculture, established in Bhubaneswar, Odisha.It is Indiaâ€™s largest centre for inland aquaculture. It was founded in 1987 by the Indian Council of Agricultural Research (ICAR), New Delhi.
